value.title: Microsoft’s Most Impactful Announcements At Ignite 2021
value.excerpt: Between pre-briefs, executive Q&As and the live event, I attended around twenty hours of Ignite 2021. Typically, Microsoft holds three focused events each year: one for developers ( Build ), channel partners ( Inspire) and end customers ( Ignite ).
